entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git cd devops-deployment sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swm-sme-be-prod.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/swm-sme-be-prod@sha256:e60094ecb611317d4593a0005a595caae7b1d97454ceea5d500832d892d94091+g' ./swa-be/production-sme/.argocd-source.yaml sed -i "s/creationTimestamp:.*/creationTimestamp: '2023-03-01T03:16:51Z'/" ./swa-be/production-sme/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./swa-be/production-sme/.argocd-source.yaml git commit -m 'Done by Jenkins Job changemanifest: swm-sme-be-prod:34' git push https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment.git HEAD:refs/heads/master
